DESCRIPTION: Manually recombine with your leading Slime, granting you 1 #yStrength.
Spawn a Slime, who takes action at the start of each turn. NL If you try to Split into a Slime that already exists, upgrade the existing one instead.
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop, removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes. Secondary effects increase by 1 for every 2 Potency.
Trigger a slime's action. Unless specified otherwise, it targets the leading slime.
Attacks for #b6 each turn. Gains damage from your #yStrength.
Attacks for #b5 each turn. When upgraded, increase damage by #b3.
Attacks for #b6 each turn, then increases its damage by #b1.
Attacks for #b3 each turn. This slime is #yCommanded whenever you play a #yTackle card. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.
Attacks for #b3 each turn. This slime is #yCommanded whenever you #yConsume. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.
Each turn and when #yCommanded, #yCommands #b2 other Slimes at random. When upgraded, increase the number of Slimes #yCommanded by #b1.
Each turn and when #yCommanded, #yRotate this to the front. Cannot be upgraded.
Grants you #b3 #yBlock each turn. When upgraded, increase #yBlock by #b2.
Attacks for #b3 to ALL enemies each turn. When upgraded, increase damage by #b2.
Attacks for #b2 and applies #b2 #yGoop each turn. When upgraded, increase #yGoop by #b3.
Attacks for #b10 to ALL enemies each turn, but skips every other attack.
0-cost cards that apply #yGoop with a variety of secondary effects.
Attacks for #b3 and applies #b5 #ySoulburn each turn.
Receives #b10% more damage per card played in a turn.
High-damage #yAttacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.
Powerful 0-cost cards, inspired by the bosses of the Spire.
Attacks for #b4 and grants you #b4 Temporary #yThorns each turn.
Attacks for #b4 and applies #b1 #yVulnerable each turn.
Attacks for #b3 each turn. When Commanded, other Darkling Slimes also attack.
Attacks for #b3 and causes you to draw #b1 card each turn.
Attacks for #b4 and applies #b1 #yWeak each turn.
Bonus effect which activates when an #yAttack is used on an enemy who has #yGoop.
A unique slime with a more powerful effect than normal slimes.
Buried cards will always be chosen last for random #yExhume effects.
